1b1: rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya badz+ra pA Ni a b+hi She ka ma hA tAn tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags
1b2: pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyad chen po/ / bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chu
1b3: sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig tu
1b4: b com ldan 'das rgyal po dbang bskur gyi khang pa chen po rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi byab
1b5: pas mngon par grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod pa'i rma mthun pa/ rin po
1b6: rgyal po chen pos shin du rnam par spras pa yod pa/ khang bzang chen po ni che'i rgyal po byang chub
1b7: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khang pa na/ pad ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri chen po// nor ba
1b8: chen po dbang gi rgyal pos ngos gnyis rnam par smras pa la bzhugs nas/ lham me lhan ne ldang ngo'i//

2a1: 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni nam thar pa'i nam mkha' la lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang pad ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri chen po de la ldam me ldan
2a2: de lhang nger bzhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen pos kun nas bskor te/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni brnyes/ sku dang gsung dang thugs ni mnyam par byin gyis
2a3: brlabs/ g.yo ba dang rlom sems thams cad dang ni bral zhing lhun gyis grub par sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug cing / 'di lta ste/ lus mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas shes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs dang /
2a4: ngag mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas shes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs dang / de bzhin du yid mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas shes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis chos kyi rnam
2a5: grangs 'di thos nas/ lus dang ngag dang yid mnyam pa nyid kyi bkod pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob ste/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa dang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
2a6: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad de nyid kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor
2a7: nas/ 'di lta ste/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas bkod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos ston pa dag mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la
2a8: la dag me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam du ma nges par ston pa 'di na byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang spyod pa la nan tan byed pa dang / sa bsgrub pa dang byang chub

2b1: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ston pa de thams cad ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis
2b2: so/ / mdor na sems can gang la la dag dge ba mngon par 'dra bya ba byed pa de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ bsdu ba'i dngos po
2b3: bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa dang snyan par smra ba dang / don spyod pa dang don mthun pas bsdus pa sha stag ste/ de dag ni rgyu de nyid dang dmigs pa de dag nyid kyis dge ba mngon par 'du byed do// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
2b4: de dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi ye shes chen po shin tu rgyas pa de thams cad mthong zhing 'jug ste/ rnam par blta zhing nye bar sems te/ dge ba ci tsam mngon par 'du byed pa yang rgyu de nyid dang
2b5: dmigs pa de nyid kyis so/ / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar du gyur cing / ya mtshan gyis 'dun pa'i snying du gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab po snyam ste cang mi smra bar gyur
2b6: nas/ / bcom ldan 'das nyid la rnam par blta zhing nye bar sems so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ya mtshan gyis snying 'dun pa mkhyen nas/ byang chub sems
2b7: dpa' thams cad yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'khor 'od zer stong phrag dum pa mgur nas phyung ngo / / de byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku thams cad snang bar byas te/ nam mkha'i
2b8: khams rab 'byam dag dang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag dbang dang ldan par gyur pa 'khod pa de dag la/ thams cad mkhyen pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// bcom ldan rims nad bral ba

3a1: de/ / dbang bskur rgyal po'i khang pa ni// skyon kun rnam par spangs pa na// snying 'thang chen po seng ge'i khri// dpag tshad sum brgya yod pa la// pad ma'i snying po der bzhugs nas// byang chub sems dpa' rnams
3a2: kyis bskor/ / gnas der thub pa chen po yis// bkod pa chen po gang sprul pa// de dag gi ni grangs tshad dang // dbyibs dang kha dog gang yin pa// de ni bskal pa grangs med du// bstan par nus pa ma yin no// de ru deng la
3a3: dpa' bo che/ / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/ yid gnyis som nyi spangs pa po// dogs pa gcod pa lta bar gyis// zhes bskul to// de nas 'od zer de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bskul
3a4: nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi mgur du rang gi gnas su bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi yang mdzod spu nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu bkod pa'i mdzod kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i 'od
3a5: zer sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par bskul ba 'khor 'od zer brgya stong dang ldan pa phyung ste/ de yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la 'dren pa bcom ldan 'das rnam
3a6: par snang mdzad la/ / blta ba dang ni mchod pa bgyi ba dang // sems can phan par bzhed pas chos brjod phyir// khyed cag thams cad ma shol 'dir gshegs shig/ ces yang dag par ston to// de nas 'od zer de dag/
3a7: yang slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu nyid du zhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 'od zer des bskul ma thag tu/ rang rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
3a8: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la/ bcom ldan 'das dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba'i slad du rgyal

3b1: po dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa chen por mchi na/ rgyal po dbang bskur gyi khang pa chen po de ni 'jig rten gyi khams gang zhig na mchis/ gang du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i
3b2: 'jig rten gyi khams de'i ming ni ci zhes bgyi/ de'i byang chub kyi snying po ni ci 'dra ba zhig lags zhes zhus so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag
3b3: gis rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam du ma
3b4: nges par ston pa dag yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam re re nges par ston pa re re la yang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtshams sbyor ba nges par ston pa'i bkod pa rab 'byam du ma yod par khong du chud par bya'o//
3b5: rigs kyi bu dag de la mtshams sbyor ba bkod pa rnams kyi tshad ni/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya dang rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / zla ba dang nyi ma bye ba phrag
3b6: brgya dag gang gi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams so/ / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya gang gi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs
3b7: pa de/ me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa dang ldan pa rab 'byam gyi mtshams sbyor ba rnams kyi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa gcig go// me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa dang ldan pa rab 'byam gyi
3b8: mtshams sbyor ba bye ba phrag brgya gang gi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa do/ / me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa rab 'byam gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud gcig go// me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod

4a1: ba'i rgyu dbye ba phrag brgya rnams gang gi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa de/ me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud par ma gcig go// rig rten gyi mas dpa khyams
4a2: bar ma'i bkod pa'i rgyud bye ba phrag brgya gang gi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa de/ me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bkod pa cig ste/ de ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
4a3: mdzad de/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yongs su sbyangs so// rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig po de
4a4: nyid bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de nyid yin te/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis ni yongs su bskor/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sa las ni shin tu 'das shing nam mkha
4a5: nyid byang chub kyi snying por byin gyis brlabs nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma de na rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po na bzhugs so// rigs kyi bu dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de ni de 'dra ste/
4a6: de'i yon tan nam spyod pa 'am smon lam ma ma ye shes kyi mtha' ni nged kyis bskal pa grangs med par yang rtogs par mi nus so// rigs kyi bu dag nged kyang bcom ldan 'das de sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na//
4a7: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la btsud de/ de da ni bcom ldan 'das de la byas pa bzo ba byas pa shes pa sha stag go/ rigs kyi bu dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de byang chub sems dpa'//
4a8: kun tu bzang po la sngon gyi spyod pa dang smon lam dang ngag gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rgyun mi gcod pa nas brtsams te/ bstan pa gnas par mdzad pa dang / theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i spyod pa rgyun mi 'chad par

4b1: 'gyur ba dang / ci lta ba bzhin du rnam par rig par bya ba dang / ci tsam du byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po byin gyis brlabs nas/ rdo rje'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las brtsams te/ ngag sna tshogs kyi
4b2: 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rgya chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa rab 'byam go bar mdzad par bzhed nas/ 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po 'di phyung ngo // de nas shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
4b3: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen tog gis byang chub sems dpa' rin chen blo gros la/ rin po che rdo rje chen po'i snying po 'di byin no// na maHsa man ta mu khe b+h+yaHsarba tra thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA dza na/ rigs
4b4: kyi bu khyod rin po che rdo rje chen po'i snying po 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams der gnas par gyis shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin chen blo gros kyis snying po 'di blangs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar
4b5: gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la mchod pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / rin po che
4b6: rdo rje chen po'i snying po 'dis mchod pa'i sprin chen po sngon ma mthong ba mngon par sprul nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang / rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa ga la ba der song ste
4b7: phyin nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa chen po yang rin po che dang rdo rje me tog gi sprin chen pos mngon par bkab bo// de bzhin du bdug pa dang spos dang phreng ba dang byug
4b8: pa dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang phye ma dang na bza' dang rgyan dang rin po che dang rdo rje'i sprin chen po dag gis bkab bo/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ga la ba der yang song nas/ byang chub sems

5a1: dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas nas ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du shar phyogs nyid du gnas te/ rin po che dang rdo rje'i khang pa brtsegs pa chen po dang
5a2: rin po che'i rgyal po chen po dang rdo rje'i dbyug gu dang pad ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri chen po dag mngon par sprul nas rin po che rdo rje chen po'i snying pos byin gyis brlabs te/ rin po che rdo rje chen po'i yi ge'i snying po'i yi ge'i snying pos phyogs
5a3: rgya yang shes shing bzhugs so/ / lho phyogs nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog kun du rgyas pa'i rgyal po'i dbang pos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
5a4: pa la/ rdo rje chen po'i ga pa rnye ba byin gyis brlabs nas bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa der/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de la phyag bya ba dang blta ba
5a5: dang mchod pa'i phyir song shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog kun du rgyas pa'i rgyal po'i dbang pos rdo rje chen po'i snying po 'di gsungs so//
5a6: na maHsa man ta mu khe b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHwas ma hA badz+ra grA ba raraM hUM/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rdo rje mchog gi snying po 'di thob cing / bcom ldan 'das des gnang bas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba
5a7: khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi sdang bar gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu/ 'jig rten gyi khams me
5a8: t og gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba de dang rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa chen po ga la ba dang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa 'di thams cad

5b1: rin po che rdo rje mchog gi snang ba chen pos snang bar byas so/ / rdo rje chen po'i mchog gi me tog dang bdug pa dang spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan rnams dang rdo rje
5b2: chen po'i mchog dang / rin po che mchog gi 'od zer gyi snang bas rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa chen po snang bar byas so// mchog sbyin pa chen po'i rdo rje mchog gi sgras phyogs bcur go bar byas so// go bar byas nas kyang ci ltar 'ongs//
5b3: pa bzhin du lho phyogs nyid du gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu rdo rje chen po'i mchog las byung ba'i pad ma'i rgyal po chen po rnams la 'dug go/ nub phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de
5b4: bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs
5b5: rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi mchog/ rdo rje chen po'i pad ma'i mchog gi snying po 'di sbyin par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyis/
5b6: rdo rje chen po'i pad ma mchog gi dkyil 'khor thugs rje'i stobs kyi snying po 'di gsungs so// na maHsa man ta mu khe b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba bA ka ru Na ba la badz+ra pad mA gra sa/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
5b7: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyis snying po 'di gsungs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la rigs kyi bu de'i dus la bab par shes nas 'jig rten gyi khams me tog
5b8: gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad de la blta ba dang phyag bya ba'i phyir song shig ces btang ngo / / de nas/

6a1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig pa rgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ 'jig rten gyi
6a2: khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir byin nas/ rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa chen po gal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das
6a3: gal ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ ci ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du nub phyogs nyid du gnas nas/ pad ma chen po'i rdo rje'i rgyal po la 'dug ste/ rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi
6a4: khang pa chen po 'di thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa thams cad du thugs rje chen po'i rdo rje mchog gi stobs kyis rang gi lus kyi rnam par rig byed kyi sprin rnams kyis kun du/
6a5: bkang nus spang bar byas so// byang phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pas byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la// rdo rje chen pos rnam
6a6: par gnon pa rdo rje chen pos rnam par rol pa/ byang chub kyi snying po'i mchog 'dzin pa'i snying po 'di sbyin par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
6a7: mi 'khrugs pas/ byang chub kyi snying po chen po mchog 'dzin pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so// na maHsa man ta mu khe b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA ba ra dmanar gri gri/ 'di gsungs nas byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po
6a8: la rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa de dang / rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang po chen po gal ba dar / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de la blta ba dang phyag bya ba'i phyir mod/

6b1: zhig ces btang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du
6b2: bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang / rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa chen po ga la ba dang / bcom/
6b3: ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ ci ltar dngos po bzhin du byar phyogs nyid du gnas nas byang chub kyi snying po chen po'i rgyan bkod par byin
6b4: gyis brlabs te/ byang chub kyi snying po'i mchog gi lus kyi sprin rnams kyis phyogs bcu rgyas par 'gengs so// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
6b5: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che mchog 'dzin gyis byang chub sems dpa' rin po che cod pan la/ dkon mchog gsum po'i rdo rje 'byung gnas rdo rje chen po'i snying po 'di sbyin par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan
6b6: 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che mchog 'dzin gyis/ dkon mchog gsum po'i rdo rje 'byung gnas kyi snying po 'di gsungs so// na maHsa man ta mu khe b+h+yaHsarba ta
6b7: thAg te b+h+yaHsarba wa oM oM dza sa/ 'di byin nas rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa de dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po der/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de la
6b8: blta ba dang phyag bya ba'i phyir song zhig ces btang ngo / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin po che cod pan/ bcom ldan 'das des snang bas 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag

7a1: brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang / rgyal po
7a2: dbang bskur gyi khang pa chen po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ga la ba der song nas ci ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams nyid du gnas nas dkon mchog gsum gyi rdo rjes brgyan
7a3: ba'i pad ma'i rgyal po la 'dug te/ dkon mchog gsum gyi sku'i sprin rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams thams ca rgyas par 'gengs so// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
7a4: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyi dpal zhes bya bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sprin gyi snying po la sprin chen po rdo rje'i mchog bkod pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i snying po sbyin par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan
7a5: 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyi dpal gyis sprin chen po rdo rje'i mchog bkod pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ / na maHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba tha ma hA badz+ram
7a6: ga bi kri ti ta bi shwa sam pa ba ha/ 'di byin nas rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa de dang rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa chen po der bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de la blta ba dang
7a7: phyag bya ba'i phyir song shig ces btang ngo / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' spen gyi snying po 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun pa
7a8: bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ ci ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du/ shar lho'i

7b1: phyogs mtshams nyid du gnas nas sprin chen po rdo rje mchog gi lus kyi rnam par rig pa'i sprin rnams kyis pad ma chen po'i rgyal po'i sprin byin gyis brlabs nas/ mchod pa chen po'i mchog gi sprin rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi
7b2: khams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing 'dug go/ lho nab kyi phyogs mtshams na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje chen po'i tog gis byang chub sems dpa'
7b3: rdo rje dpa' bo la rdo rje las byung ba'i snying po sbyin par mdzad do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i tog gis/ rdo rje chen po las byung ba'i snying po 'di
7b4: gsungs so/ / na maHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba pA badz+rod bA be swA hA/ 'di byin nas btang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje dpa' bo 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi sdang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
7b5: bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang rgyal po
7b6: dbang bskur gyi khang pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ga la ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ ci ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams nyid du
7b7: gnas nas/ rdo rje chen po las byung ba'i rdo rje chen po'i rgyan rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing / rdo rje'i gzugs kyis rgyan pa'i rdo rje chen po'i pad ma la 'dug go// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams
7b8: na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgra dbyangs snyan pas byang chub sems dpa' 'brug sgra'i rgyal po la rdo rje'i sgra dbyangs sgrags pa'i snying po sbyin par mdzad do/ /

8a1: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgra dbyangs shin tu snyan pas/ rdo rje'i yi ge'i snying po 'di gsungs so// na maHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te
8a2: b+h+yaHsarba bA badz+ra k+Sha ra nirag+ho Sha bi kran ta swA hA/ 'di byin nas btang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'brug sgra'i rgyal po bcom ldan 'das des snang bas/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur
8a3: te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i
8a4: rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa chen po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ga la ba der sod nas/ ci ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams nyid du gnas te/ dbyangs
8a5: kyi rig byed mtha' yas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad go bar byed cing / rang gi smon lam las nges par byung ba'i rin po che chen po'i padam la 'dug go// 'og gi phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
8a6: bdagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i pad ma rnam par dag pa'i snying pos/ byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i yan lag la spyod pa chen po'i rgyal po'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs so// namaH
8a7: sarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA hi he swA hA/ 'di byin nas btang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i yan lag bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi sna bar gyur nas/ byang chub
8a8: sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan

8b1: bkod pa ga la ba dang / rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa chen po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad ga la ba der song nas/ bcom
8b2: ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ ci ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du 'og gi phyogs nyid du gnas nas/ pad ma'i rgyal po chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa sna tshogs pa dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig
8b3: rten gyi khams rgyas par 'gengs shing / pad ma'i rgyal po rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po la 'dug go/ steng gi phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
8b4: sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las shin du rnam pa ra rgyal ba la byang chub kyi stobs kyi snying po sbyin pa mdzad do// nas de zhin/ shegs pargyal ba'i bye nas kyis byang chub kyi stobs kyi snying po'i de gsungs so//
8b5: nam parba mu'i b+h+ya marba ta thAg te b+h+ya sa na tho bo d+ha/ ra d+harma swA/ di byin nas btang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par rgyal babacom ldan 'das des gnad pas 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig
8b6: brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig du/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang / rgyal po
8b7: dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa chen po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad ga la ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong
8b8: du mar bskor ba byas te ci ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du steng gi phyogs nyid du gnas nas/ chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs ma mtha' yas pa go bar byed pa'i sgos 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing / chos

9a1: nyid las byung ba'i pad ma chen po la 'dug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus shing / 'khod pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhing 'di
9a2: dag tu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa sngon ma mthong ba mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad shin du lham me lhan ne lhang nge ba dang / rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral zhing / nam mkha' ltar
9a3: gdod ma nas zhi ba dang yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chen po ltar bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa yang mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ sgra skad cig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//
9a4: rtog pa thams cad spangs pa'o// gzod nas zhi zhing ma skyes pa// mgon po rmad byung dam pa 'di// ci ltar sa la snang zhig gu// sku yis phrin las mi mdzad la// gsung dang thugs kyis mi mdzad cing // sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan
9a5: dang ldan/ / shin tu dag pa'i shel dang 'dra// sku yis sems can thams cad la// sangs rgyas mdzad pa rnams mdzad kyang // sku la 'gyur ba mi mnga' ste// thub pa de ni 'gyur mi mnga'// gsung ni brag cha 'dra ba ste// bstan du med
9a6: cing gzugs med kyang / / lha yi rnga chen ci bzhin du// 'gro ba thams cad tshim par mdzad// thugs ni rlom sems bral ba ste// de la yul ni mnga' ma lags// yul rnams dang ni de bral yang // sems can rnams ni yul du gyur//
9a7: gsung ni de bzhin sems can de// de bzhin sku dang de bzhin thugs// mtshan nyid gcig dang rab ldan zhing // smra ba'i nang na mchog tu snang // skye ba med la grol ba yi// de bzhin gsheg pa yod min pas// gang dag skye
9a8: med shes pa/ / de dag 'dren pa rnam par shes// mgon po rtag tu mnyam bzhag cing // lus dang ngag dang yid bral yang // rtag par lus ngag spyod yul du// thub pa rgyun du rab tu snang // byang chub sems dpa' che ba nyid//

9b1: shin du dka' ba byed pa dag/ sangs rgyas ye shes che 'bar ba// 'di 'dra yongs su tshol bar byed// de ba'i mig ni mi snang zhing // rna ba dang ni sna yang min// lce dang lus dang yid kyang ni// de phyir da yi yul ma yin//
9b2: gzugs min sgra yang ma yin te// dri dang ro dang reg ma yin// dbang po ma yin rnam shes min// thams cad du ni rtag tu zhi// yul can dang ni yul de dag/ rnam par brtags pas yod ma yin// yul can yod pa ma
9b3: yini pas/ / mung rnams srid pa ma yin no/ ma par ma btags tshul dro/ na na thams dan/ sam pa ji bani rdzogs mdzad pa// ston pa yid bzhi no bu ltar / kun gyi mdun bzugs pa yin// khyis pa ji ltar rnags pa bzhin/ te// rag tse yod min pa// den mapon po yod krung / gzugs
9b4: brnyan 'byung ba'i tshul gyis su/ / ting 'dzin dbang sbyar rnams la ni// lhasgra 'brel gtam thams cad kyis// kun gyi lo ngas spyod 'os su 'gyur// rnam par snang mdzad mgon mthong nas// de tshe kun gyis ting dzin dang/ gzungs dang rig dang rnam par thar// bsam gyis mi khyab thams cad
9b5: thob/ / gzungs la dbang ni thob gyur cing // sangs rgyas ye shes tshol byed pa// bdag cag rnams ni thams cad kyang // phyogs bcu dag nas lhags pa yin// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzungs// de ni gzungs kyi/
9b6: mchog yin te// yang dag rdzogs sangs yang dag par// de ni bdag cag thob par shog/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i
9b7: mtha' med pa dang / de bzhin du ngag dang yid kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' med pas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyis gang yin pa la 'jug go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngo bo nyid yo/
9b8: su shes pas lus kyi mngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs so// de bzhin du ngo bo nyid yongs su shes pas ngag dang yid kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs so// lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor las

10a1: gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o/ / // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
10a2: khams nas 'dus pa de dag kyang mkhyen/ rgyal po dbang bskur gyi khang pa chen po na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'khod pa dag kyang mkhyen nas/ ting nge 'dzin gang gi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
10a3: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ yongs su
10a4: mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha'i bar du/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byin gyis rlob pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ rnam par snang ba bkod pa'i rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs
10a5: ma thag tu/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi mtshams sbyor ba'i bkod pa thams
10a6: cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gling bzhi pa thams cad dang / stong thams cad dang / stong gnyis pa thams cad dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po thams cad dang / 'jig
10a7: rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gtan la phab pa thams cad dang / me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bsam
10a8: pa sna tshogs dang / re ba sna tshogs dang 'dod pa sna tshogs dang / theg pa sna tshogs kyi rnam par gnas pa dang / 'gro ba sna tshogs dang skye gnas sna tshogs dang / ljongs sna tshogs dang kha dog sna tshogs dang dbyibs

10b1: sna tshogs dang / sems can sna tshogs dag la sgra dang tshig brjod pa rnam par gzhag pa sna tshogs kyis sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mtha'i bar du/ sangs rgyas
10b2: kyi mdzad pa yang dag par ston cing / rang gi gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor las byung ba/ sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs bkod pa'i rgyan gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis/ byang chub sems
10b3: dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos yang dag par byin gyis brlabs nas/ rdo rje dkyil 'khor chen po don yod pa dang / bstan pa gnas par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gcig nas cig/
10b4: tu brgyud pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir/ dus kyi dbang gis skye ba rim gyis yongs su bzung bar byin gyis brlabs te/ rdo rje ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba chen po dang / rdo rje chen po'i snying po dang / rdo rje chen po'i 'od 'phro ba/
10b5: rgyas par 'gengs pa'i snang ba dang / theg pa chen po'i spyod pa dang / gsang sngags rnam par dag pa'i sgos rdo rje'i 'khor yug chen po'i dkyil 'khor du lag na rdo rje dbang chen po bskur ba mdzad pa mthong ngo // de ltar
10b6: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir thams cad du spros pa med pa'o/ / rtog pa dang bral ba'i phyir rnam par mi rtog pa'o// ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i phyir stong pa'o// gdong ma nas dag
10b7: pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa'o/ / skye ba dang bral ba'i phyir ma skyes pa'o// bsam pa'i sa las shin tu 'das pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// yul dang bral ba'i phyir yul med pa'o// tshig gi lam las shin tu 'das
10b8: pa'i phyir brjod par bya ba ma yin pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad du sems can thams cad yang dag par 'du ba'i sa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dang 'dra bar bsam

11a1: pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa thams cad rjes su mthun pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na gzugs brnyan gyi rnam par sems can thams cad kyi mdun na 'dug pa/ nor bu rin po che chen
11a2: po rin thang chen po gos dri ma can gyis dkris pa lta bu 'di su'i yin 'di ci zhig ces sems can rnams kyis mi shes te/ ya mtshan zhig tu gyur to// gang dag blo glos rnam par dag pa yid gnyis dang the tsom dang bral ba
11a3: sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa theg pa chen po'i gsang sngags dang spyod pa'i tshul la byang chub kyi sems skyed pa dang po// rdo rje 'chang thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par
11a4: snang mdzad kyis rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i rgyan gyi snying po'i 'od zer chen pos snang bar byas pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la zhugs pa dag ste/ de dag ni gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul 'di mnyan pa
11a5: dang bslab pa dang / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po bri ba dang / dngos grub bsgrub par bya ba'i skal pa yod do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i mtshan gyis gling bzhi pa bar
11a6: ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'dzam bu gling du bdud pham par mdzad nas/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ dga' ldan gyi gnas na gnas pa nas bzung ste/ mthar gyis spyad pa spyod cing yongs su mya
11a7: ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mtha'i bar du byin gyis brlabs nas chos bstan to/ / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de yang bstan pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po dang byams pa dang /
11a8: 'jam dpal dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / sa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngan song thams cad spong ba la sogs pa byang

11b1: chub sems dpa' rnams bsdus nas/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa thams cad kyi mdun du/ rdorje dkyil 'khor chen po bris nas
11b2: lag na rdo rje dbang chen po bskur bas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dbang bskur nas de nyid la bstan pa gtad do/ / lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las/ sngon gyi spyod pa yang dag par
11b3: bsgrub pa'i gtam gyi tshul 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o/ / 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud chen po// bam po gnyis pa// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/
11b4: bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po dpal yon tan gyi 'byung gnas na/ shing sa la sna tshogs kyi nags tshal stug po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi spyod pas rnam par rol pa'i rgyu mthun pas byin gyis
11b5: brlabs pa'i nags tshal chen po mchog na/ dge slong khri nyi stong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa sems kyi dbang thams
11b6: cad kyis dam pa'i pha rol du son pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag dang / tshe dang ldan pa dbang chen dang / tshe dang ldan pa nyin gung dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od bsrung chen po
11b7: dang / / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa bzang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgragacan zin dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang / tshe dang ldan
11b8: pa ka bin chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong dang / tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od bsrung dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od bsrung dang / tshe dang ldan pa tshems chen dang / tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang / tshe dang

12a1: ldan pa mdzes dga' dang / tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor dang / tshe dang ldan pa seng ldeng nags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa bsod snyoms len pa bar d+hadza dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs spyod dbang po'i bu dang /
12a2: dang ldan pa nye sbyor dang / tshe dang ldan pa gzhon nu 'od srungs dang / tshe dang ldan pa lam phran bstan dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / de dag la sogs pa dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya dang thabs gcig go// byang chub sem/
12a3: dpa'i tshogs che po gad+hag dis ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / dra ba can gyi 'od gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i blo
12a4: gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu brtson par chos la gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos thams
12a5: cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gdung ba thams cad rab tu zhi ldan dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rab tu brtan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pas pan byed dang /
12a6: byang chub sems dpa' snying rje can dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po che dang / byang chub sems dpa'
12a7: nam mkha' mdzod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'brug sgra'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sang sang po'i dbyangs dang /
12a8: byang chub sems dpa' blo gros dri ma med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' bla ma'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa

12b1: thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi
12b2: zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dang / bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang thabs gcig ste de dag thams cad kyang sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang / gzungs dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
12b3: dang / 'phags pa'i lam dang / dbang thob pa/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa/ sngon gyi smon lam ci lta ba bzhin du nges
12b4: par byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba la mkhas pa rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par dam pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba la mkhas pa sha stag ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
12b5: po de lta bu dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das pad ma'i snying po seng ge'i khri chen po la bzhugs te/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ shin du lham me
12b6: lhan ne lhang nge'o/ / gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu rnams kyang de nyid du 'dus te 'khod do// mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bus kun nas bskor cing de nyid du 'dus te 'dug par gyur to// lha'i dbang
12b7: po brgya byin yang lha'i bu brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te 'khor de nyid du 'dus nas 'dug par gyur to/ / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab sim dang / thag bzang ris dang zhing mchog
12b8: dang ba ti dang / rnga chen dang dus kyi 'khor lo can dang dri ma med pa dang / tog dang zla gdong dang / rnam par 'joms dang / zab mo dang stobs can dang / sgra gcan dang / tog dregs dang rnam par snang ba dang / lha ma yin gyi

13a1: dbang po sna tshogs phreng ba can dang de dag la sogs pa de dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po gzhan stong dang lha ma yin gyi dbang po de dag thams cad rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ lha ma yin gyi mthu chen po dang / lha
13a2: ma yin gyi rdzu 'phrul chen pos me tog dang spos dang phreng ba dang bdug pa dang / zug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang rgyan dang sil snyan dang ba di rnams mngon par sprul nas shing sa la
13a3: sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po gal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ ci ltar sprul
13a4: pa'i me tog dang bdug pa dang spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang rgyan dang sil snyan dang theg mo rnams bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der gtor to// gtor nas kyang bcom ldan/
13a5: 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po 'od zer brgya pa dang / klu'i rgyal po klog lce dang / klu'i rgyal po rin po che cod pan can dang / klu'i rgyal/
13a6: po 'jog po dang / klu'i rgyal po sog ma med dang / klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas dang / klu'i rgyal po stobs kyi rgyu dang / klu'i rgyal po rna rdum dang / klu'i rgyal po pad ma can dang / klu'i rgyal po dung skyong dang / klu'i rgyal po pad ma chen po dang / kli
13a7: rgyal po dus can dang / klu'i rgyal po rigs can dang / klu'i rgyal po mgo gcig pa dang / klu'i rgyal po brdzun po dang / klu'i rgyal po dbang po'i sgra dang / klu'i rgyal po stobs ldan dang de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po khri rang rang gi gnas
13a8: nas byung ste/ klu'i mthu chen po dang klu'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos tsan dan gor shi sha'i chu'i sprin mngon par sprul nas/ shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das gal ba

13b1: der song ste/ lhags nas ci ltar sprul pa'i spos chu'i sprin rnams kyis shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags chal stug por char du mngon par phab bo// phab nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas
13b2: phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yul 'khor bsrung dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po
13b3: 'phags skyes po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po mig mi bzang dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gang ba bzang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rmongs byed 'dzin
13b4: chu'i dbang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag pa brgya pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lngas rtsen dang de dag la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po khri rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ me tog dang
13b5: bdug pa dang spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang sil snyan rnams thogs nas/ shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la
13b6: ba dang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ / ci ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang bdug pa dang / spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan rnams bcom ldan 'das
13b7: la gtor to/ / gtor nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'khor mi'am ci'i me tog dang bdug pa dang spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang phye ma dang na
13b8: bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang sil snyan dang pheg rdogs pa du ma thogs pa brgya stong du ma rang rang gi gnas nas byung te/ shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang /

14a1: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas ci ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang bdug pa dang spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang / sil snyan dang pheg to rnams
14a2: bcom ldan 'das la gtor to/ / gtor nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// nam mkha' lding gi dbang po rnam par 'dud byed kyi bu dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po 'jig 'gro dang / nam mkha'
14a3: lding gi dbang po 'dab brgyad dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po gtsug phud can 'khor nam mkha' lding brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa yang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te
14a4: phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / srin po'i bdag po khros bzhin dang srin po'i bdag po mche ba bzang dang / srin po'i bdag po drag po dang rab gtum dang 'jigs 'jigs lha dang / skrag byed dang 'jigs byed chen po dang gdong bcu
14a5: dang / gshin rje dang gshin rje'i dril bu dang rnam par 'jigs 'jigs lha dang / zla ba'i sde 'khor srin po du ma dang ldan pa dag kyang shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang bcom
14a6: ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// drang srong chen po me 'khor drang srong du ma dang ldan pa yang shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod
14a7: pa'i nags tshal sdug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// rlung sprin gyi phreng ba can dang / rlung 'jig
14a8: byed dang rlung chags byed dang / rlung kun du 'jog byed dang / rlung rnam par mthor dang rlung dus ldan dang / rlung rnam par mthor rlung dang / rlung rlung dmar dang / rlung 'jig rten 'dzin dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags/

14b1: nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// skar ma'i rgyal po zla ba 'khor skar ma brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa yang shing sa la chen po sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga
14b2: la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// nyi ma 'od zer gyi 'phreng ba can dang tsha bar byed pa dang skams byed dang dug
14b3: 'byin dang rab 'bar dang / nyi ma sred byed 'khor lha'i bu gzi brjid 'phangs pa brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa dag kyang shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das gal
14b4: pa der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// klu'i rgyal po chu lha 'khor klu'i rgyal po du ma dang ldan pa yang shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i
14b5: nags tshal sdug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// khyab 'jug 'khor dang bcas pa yang shing sa laH
14b6: tshogs bkod pa'i rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po gal ba dang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song te phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ drag po yi dgas kyi
14b7: 'khor dang ldan pa yang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan 'khor 'byung po brgya stong du ma dang ldan
14b8: pa yang shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs cig/

15a1: du 'dug go// gza'i rgyal po chen po smin drug gi bu 'khor gza' brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa yang shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po gal ba dang bcom ldan 'das ga
15a2: la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ spen lce'i bu skya bo zhes bya ba dang sprin lha'i bu klog phreng zhes bya ba dang / sprin lha'i bu sprin gyi drabastu
15a3: po 'joms byed ces bya ba dang / sprin lha'i bu char 'bebs zhes bya ba 'khor lha'i bu brgya stong dum dang ldan pa dag kyang shings lo sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshol stug pa ga la ba dang bcom ldan
15a4: 'das gal ba der song sa phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / glog sdug byed ces bya ba dang / glog gzi brjid can zhes bya ba dang / glog stug 'od ces bye
15a5: dang / glog mdzes phreng can zhes bya ba 'khor klog brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa dag kyang shings la sku tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal srug po gal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste phyin nas/
15a6: bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// ri'i rgyal po rab dang / ri'i rgyal po spos kyi dang ldang dang / de'i rgyal po gangs ri dang / ri'i rgyal po 'bigs byed dang ri'i rgyal po ma la
15a7: yang pa ri'i rgyal po dbang chen dang ri'i rgyal po mi mjed can dang / ri'i rgyal po rtse mo brgya pa dang / ri'i rgyal po sna tshogs brtsegs dang / ri'i rgyal po rig sngags 'chang dang / ri'i rgyal po gzhan dag kyang shing sa la sna tshogs
15a8: kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal sug po gal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gshin rje da nge mtshan mo

15b1: nag mo dang be con nag mo can dang / skyes bu nag po dang 'chi bdag dang dpal byin ma dang / rna nag ma yang shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste
15b2: lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / dka' thub zlog ma dang tsa muN Di dang / drag po'i chung ma dang / tshangs pa'i chung ma dang // khyab 'jug gi chung ma dang / gzhon nu'i chung
15b3: ma dang lus ngan gyi chung ma dang / phag gi chung ma dang // 'jigs byed chen po'i chung ma dang / shings la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po gal ba dang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags
15b4: nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// chu klung chen po gaM gA dang chu klung chen po si ta dang chu klung chen po dbyangs can dang / chu klung chen po bi sta dang / chu klung chen po bla
15b5: ba'i tsha can dang / chu klung chen po ya mun na dang / chu klung chen po kun gyi bshes gnyen dang / chu klung chen po mgyogs ldan dang / chu klung chen po mtsho sten dang / chu klung chen po ba glang sbyin mchog ldan dang / chu klung chen po
15b6: brtseb sbyin yang shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs cig/
15b7: tu 'khod do// dri za'i rgyal po sna tshogs phreng ba can dang / dri za'i rgyal po 'phrog pa dang / dri za'i rgyal po shug ma chen dang / dri za'i rgyal po rnam par gnon pa dang / dri za'i rgyal po chu skyes dang / dri za'i rgyal po ud pa la lta/
15b8: bu'i mig dang / dri za'i rgyal po tsan dan brtsegs kyang shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la

16a1: mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po tog dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po nye ba'i tog dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po rab gtum dang rig sngags
16a2: 'chang gi rgyal po bsnyems ldan dang rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po shugs 'chang dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po sna tshogs sde dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po de dag dang gzhan yang 'khor rig sngags
16a3: 'chang gi rgyal po brgya stong dum dang ldan pa dag kyang shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
16a4: mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / srin mo so can zhes bya ba dang / srin mo g.yengs byed ces bya ba dang / srin mo mtshan mo rgyu zhes bya ba dang / srin mo 'chang ba ces bya ba dang / srin mo rmongs byed ces bya ba dang /
16a5: srin mo dgod ma zhes bya ba dang / srin mo rdo rje lta bu'i lto zhes bya ba dang / srin mo bum lto ma zhes bya ba dang / srin mo zangs 'dab can zhes bya ba dang / srin mo klog lce ma zhes bya ba dang / srin mo bun tsa le zhes bya ba dang / srin mo bong
16a6: mo zhes bya ba dang / srin mo 'jigs su rung ma zhes bya ba dang / srin mo zhib ma lta bu'i sen mo can zhes bya ba dang / srin mo chen mo de dag dang gzhan yang srin mo 'khor du ma dang ldan pa dag kyang shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal
16a7: mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 'byung po'i rgyal po mdung
16a8: can dang 'byung po'i rgyal po gshol can dang / 'byung po'i rgyal po gtun shing can dang / 'byung po'i rgyal po gshol 'dzin dang / 'byung po'i rgyal po 'gugs byed dang / 'byung po'i rgyal po yang dag 'gugs byed dang / 'byung

16b1: po'i rgyal po gnya' drag 'khor 'byung po brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa yang shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan
16b2: 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / sha za thams cad dang mdangs 'phrog pa thams cad dang / gnon po thams cad dang / grib gnon thams cad dang yi dgas thams cad dang /
16b3: bdud thams cad dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad dang / stobs po che'i tshogs kyi bdag po dang / de dag thams cad shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po gal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
16b4: der song ste lhags na sa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / sring mo bzhi gang yin pa de dag kyang phyogs bzhi nas lhags te gcig du 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
16b5: der song ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / de'i tshe shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po shin du yangs shing tha gru che la ka tsa lin
16b6: dki ltar reg na bde bar gyur cing / sa gzhi rdo rje dang bai dUr+ya dang spug gi kha khyer gyis rnam par phye ba/ ngos gnyis ka'i sgo gang dang rta babs dang skar khung gis brgyan te mdzes par byas pa steng du rin po che chen po'i dril bu
16b7: g.yer ka'i dra ba bres pa/ mu tig gi do shal mang po sbyangs pa dar gyi lda ldi mang po bres pa sil snyan dang pheg rdob pa snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin pa/ lha'i me tog ud pa la dang ku mu ta dang pad ma dkar po dang dri mchog gi
16b8: sa phyogs der bkram par gyur te/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis/ shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po thams cad rdo rje chen po'i 'khor yug

17a1: gi ris bskor ba rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khyams su gyur pa chu zhed dpag tshad 'bum phrag bcu pa dus thams cad pa'i me tog gis legs par brtun pa/ lha'i chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas phyogs ma yongs
17a2: s u gang ba byang chub sems dpa'i las kyis byung ba ste dper na gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi rgyal po'i gnas dag pa'i las kyis byung ba ldan ne lhang nge gnas pa de bzhin du shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags
17a3: tshal stug po yang / bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus lhan ner rnam par mdzes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa rdo rje'i 'byung gnas shes bya ba'i
17a4: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba'i gsung phyung ste/ rdo rje 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs
17a5: so/ / dpa' bo chen po legs so legs// rdo rje 'byung gnas stobs po che// shAkya seng ge skyob pa yi// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di la ni// rdo rje stobs chen bsrung bar gyis// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHswA hA// rdo rje 'byung
17a6: gnas kyi snying po'i mchog 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du rdo rje'i 'byung gnas kyi snying po sgra gcig nas gcig tu'ur ces grag par gyur te/
17a7: rdo rje 'thung gnas dpa' bo che// sems can kun la phan mdzad pa// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di la ni// thub pa chen pos byin gyis rlobs// rtag tu srog chags thams cad kyang // snying po 'di ni 'dzin gyur cig/ des na 'dir
17a8: ni de dag kun/ / tshul chen dngos grub thob par shog/ ces grags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la gzigs nas/ kun tu bzang po dang byams pa dang / 'jam dpal

17b1: la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gang rnam par dag pa'i sgo la 'jug pa'i mdzod kyi snying po zhes/
17b2: bya ba'i gsang sngags la 'jug pa gsang sngags kyi sgo byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes su 'brang ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i gnas rdo rje ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba gsang ba'i dkyil
17b3: ' khor thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par ston pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal po lta bu 'phral du 'bras bu mang ba byang chub sems dpa'i gsang chen byang chub sems dpas legs par brjod pa byang chub
17b4: s ems dpa'i mig 'phrul byang chub sems dpa'i sgyu mas rnam par rol pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang yongs su mi shes na sems can gzhan dag gis shes
17b5: par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ gzhan du na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa
17b6: ngag ni ma gtogs te rdo rje chen po'i ye shes dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor lag na rdo rje dbang chen po bskur ba zhes bya ba gsang ba'i mchog yod do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po la sogs pa dang thams
17b7: cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni dus lags so// bde bar gshegs pa 'di ni tshod lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi spyod pa yang dag par ston pa sgrub pa'i
17b8: snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sngon gyi spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo rdo rje chen po'i 'byung gnas gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di gsungs so/ / na maHsarba mu khi b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA la ma/

18a1: gsang sngags kyi rgyal po gsungs ma thag tu de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i snying gis mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/ kye ma ye shes skyid pa che// bsam gtan bde ba mchog thob pa//
18a2: kun kyang de yis dbang du byas// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor do ngo mtshar rtse gcig tu gyur par mkhyen nas/ dpal be'u las byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer
18a3: phyung ngo / / de byung nas byang chub sems dpa'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas te/ yang bcom ldan 'das kyi dpal be'u nyid du zhugs so// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po zhes bya ba'i 'jig
18a4: rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa 'di thams cad du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi spyod pa bstan par smon lam btab nas gnod sbyin 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung ste dbus kyi 'dzam/ bu gling mi mjed 'dir lcang lo can du gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas kyi gnas na gnas pa de'i 'od zer gyi snang ba des snang bar gyur nas/
18a5: mig dang bzhin rgyas par gyur nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod de//
18a6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid yid la byed cing cang mi zer bar 'dug par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po 'ong bar 'gyur ba'i brda mdzad de tshigs su bcad
18a7: pa yang 'di gsungs so/ / sems can dag pa zla bzhin tshur gshegs cig/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin brlabs byang chub gzhol// bsam yas mnyam nyid legs rtogs khong chud khyod// rtag tu sangs rgyas byas gzo chur shog/
18a8: cig/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la rtag gnas pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje mchog tshur shog/ phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas ci snyed gcig/ sems can don mdzad bsam yas gzugs mnga' ba// de dag ma lus don gyi mdun

18b1: 'gro khyod/ / gsang ba'i bdag po sems can mchog tshur shog/ gsang ba'i dam pa sems can snying po tshur// gdul dka' rtag 'dul dbang thob chur shog cig/ brten te byung las skyes pa'o// dus dang tshod shes tshur shog cig/ dang
18b2: ba thob pa tshur shog/ cig/ dam pa sbyin byed tshur shog cig/ dpal byed dpal sdud dpal ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa sras chur shog/ sems can bzang ba stobs po che// rdo rje lta bur tshur shog cig/ sangs rgyas sras po 'jigs med
18b3: pa/ / stobs can rnams kyi mchog tshur shog/ rtag tu srid pa gsum de yi// snying dga' byed pa tshur shog cig/ yang dag la ma ni ston byed pa// stobs bcur gnas pa tshur shog cig/ sems can dag pardzu 'phrul che// kun du bzang
18b4: po tshur shog cig/ kun du mdzes pa tshur shog cig/ srid gsum dbang phyug tshur shog cig/ khyod ni gzugs bzang shin tu brgyan// glang po rna ba khyod tshur shog/ sna tshogs gzugs can 'khrul med khyod// mthong na dga' ba tshur shog/
18b5: cig/ 'gro lding ba yi gzugs can tshur// tshur shog nA dku re ba// rtag tu sna tshogs gros phreng 'chang // cod pan mgul ba tshur shog cig/ mi 'jigs thob pa tshur shog cig/ 'jigs pa 'jigs pa tshur shog cig/ sangs rgyas
18b6: sras po rdzu 'phrul che/ / phyi shol ma byed tshur shog cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs nas 'ong ba la 'jigs pa med pa'i sgo'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsungs pa/ na maHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga
18b7: te b+h+yaHsarba tha a bi sA ye be shar r+ya mya khe b+ha ga ba ti badz+ra a ma li ni mabi laM ba swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'jigs pa'i sgo'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di bka' stsal nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom
18b8: ldan 'das kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'dis bskul bas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos gnod sbyin gyi tshogs thams cad la smras pa/ grogs po dag tshur gshegs bcom ldan 'das de la blta ba dang phyag bya ba dang /

19a1: bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' du ma'i tshogs kyis ni bskor/ nyan thos brgya stong du mas ni bskor lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po
19a2: dang mi dang mi ma yin pa bye ba stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po gal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
19a3: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa bzhugs pa ga la ba der 'dong ngo / / de nas gnod sbyin gyi tshogs de dag dang gnod sbyin gzhon nu rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/ sems can chen po bka' stsal
19a4: pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la yang blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du/ shing sa la sna tshogs/
19a5: kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba der bzhud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po de'i tshe rgyan sna tshogs shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin spyod pa thams cad kyi rgyu mthun pa ston pa la snyoms par
19a6: zhugs so/ / byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan bkod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kham
19a7: tsam ru/ yangs shing rgya che ba nor bu chen po'i ka ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma zug pa/ sgo gang dang rtababs dang / stegs bu dums brgyan pa 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las shing sa la cog pa lta bur byas pas rnam par spras pa
19a8: mtha' mthar phug ron lta bu'i phreng gis mdzes par byas pa mu tig gi sna gnyi ga'i dra bas bres pa rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas steng gi bar snang yongs su bskor ba lha'i ras bcos ma dang / dar gyi lnga ldi mang po bres

19b1: pas mdzes par byas pa/ lha'i sil snyan dang pheg rdob pa snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin pa/ lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gru len gar byed rol mo byed cing snyan par sprul gdubu dang rna cha gdub 'khor gyis brgyan cing lha'i
19b2: lngas dang ldan pa rnams kyis gang ba rin po che chen po'i tha re kun du bres pas phyogs bai dur+ya chen pos legs par smras pa/ katsa li dka ltar regan bde ba dus thams cad pa'i me tog gi shing ljon pas legs par brtan pa lnga'i
19b3: rin po che'i them skas kyi phreng gis rnam par spras pa/ dang pa dang bzhad dang ngur ba dang / shang shang te'u dang / ne tso dang ri skegs dang rma bya dang / khrung khrung dang bya'i tshogs dum sgra 'byin pa dang / lha'i me tog ud pa la dang ku mu tradang
19b4: pad ma dkar po dang / dri mchog dang pad ma drang / ka la ra ka dang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba'i rdzing byang chub sems dpas yongs su spyad par bya ba lha'i tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i rdzab kyi rnyog pa can dag gis
19b5: kun nas mdzes par byas pa rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par khang pa brtsegs pa der lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dang pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen po dang / sa brdol dang sa brdol chen po'i me tog gi char mngon par 'bab pa/
19b6: a ga ru nag po'i bdug pa'i sprin mang pos khebs par rnam par mdzes par byung bar gyur te/ khang pa brtsegs pa de'i nang du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis so so'i gnas bsam pa ci lta ba bzhin du las kyis
19b7: bskyed pa de dag mngon par sprul to/ / khang pa brtsegs pa de dag re rer yang rin po che'i dbang gi rgyal po la sogs pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu bcu drug/ rin po che'i rgyal po la sogs pa ci ltar 'dod pa bzhin du yongs su spyad
19b8: par bya ba sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po dag bkod do/ / rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan bkod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad gdugs dang rgyal mtshan

20a1: dang ba dan pa skyed pas mdzes par byas so/ / khang pa'i brtsegs pa de dag tu yang pad ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri rnams sprul to// khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyang bai dUr+ya chen po gsal ba'i rang bzhin can te/
20a2: 'di lta ste dper na shin du byis pa'i me long ci lta ba bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan bkod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa yang rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag cing gsal ba ste bai dUr+ya gsal ba'i phyir der stong gsum gyi
20a3: stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du snang ngo / / dbus su ni bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri 'gro ba thams cad kyi bkod pa'i snying po rin po che'i rgyal po las byas pa mngon par sprur/
20a4: to// sems can thams cad nye bar 'tshe ba'i yo byad kyi sprin dag/ khang pa brtsegs pa der kun nas rtag tu bab par mngon par sprul te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
20a5: mdzad kyi sngon gyi spyod pa rgya mtsho spyad pa'i phyir ro/ / de ltar bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir mngon par sprul pa nas/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang phyag bya ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang chos mnyan pa'i phyir gnod sbyin
20a6: g yi tshogs chen po dang lhan cig tu gnod sbyin gzhon nu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos khang
20a7: pa brtsegs pa de lag pa gnyis kas blangs te steng gi bar snang las babs te shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po gal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
20a8: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ngo / / khang pa brtsegs pa de'i 'od kyis shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bgod pa'i nags tshal stug po 'di thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par/

20b1: snang bar gyur nas gang dag 'khor der 'dus shing 'khod pa'i lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang mi 'am ci dang lto'iphye chen po dang mi dang mi yin pa de dag snang ba des snang bar byas pas phyogs bzhir rnam par bltas pa dang /
20b2: steng gi bar snang la dpag tshad 'bum phrag drug bcu rtsa brgyad ni me'i phung po chen po ltar 'bar ba nyi ma stong ltar lam mer rnam par mdzes par mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang ya mtshan du gyur pa'i snying gis phan tshun rnam par bltas
20b3: nas cang mi smra bar 'khod par gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gzungs thob pa dang bzod pa thob pa dang / stobs thob pa de dag gis kyang rnam par bltas na me'i phung po chen po ltar 'bar ba
20b4: nyi ma stong ltar lham mer rnam par mdzes par mthong nas de dag kyang ya mtshan du gyur pa'i snying gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di nas ngas dpag tshad 'bum phrag drug bcu rtsa brgyad kyi steng gi bar snang la lham me lhan ne lhang nger gdab zhing bcom ldan 'das rtogs par dka' ba brjod par dka' ba 'di ni ci lags/
20b5: de skad ces gsol ba dang /
20b6: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang lha'i 'khor chen po de dag la bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
20b7: sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po zhes bya ba de la blta ba dang phyag bya ba dang mchod pa bya ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ongs te/ nga la mchod pa'i phyir rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i khang
20b8: pa brtsegs pa mngon par sprul pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod pa bstan pa'i cho 'phrul sngon gyi spyod pa bsgrub pa'i rgyu mthun pa ste/ 'di ni chos gang gi yon tan bskal pa brgyar yang mtha' rtogs par mi nus pa

21a1: de'i 'od lham me ldan ne lhang nger 'dug pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po de yang theg pa chen po la 'jug pa'i sgo rnam par dag pa'i gnas shes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kun du rig/
21a2: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig gi lan 'di bka' stsal ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po shing ta la bdun srid tsam gyi steng gi bar sdang la 'dug nas shing sa la snga tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan
21a3: bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po thams cad du/ lha'i me tog dang bdug pa dang / spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye mang gos dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang bdan dang pheg rdob pa'i sprin mngon par sprul te char du ba banas
21a4: steng gi nam mkha' las babs te khang pa brtsegs pa de bcom ldan 'das la phul lo/ / phul nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// su dang gsung dang thugs mkhyen pas/ rnam dag brtul zhugs bzang po pa//
21a5: rtog pa kun gyis rnam dag pa// phyag 'tshal sems can dag khyod la// mig dang de bzhin rna ba dang // sna dang de bzhin lce dang ni// lus dang de bzhin yid kyis ni// smra ba'i mchog la bdag phyag 'tshal// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro// reg
21a6: bya yul can 'chal ba yi/ dngos po kun la rnam grol ba// rgyal ba mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// gdong nas zhi nang ma skyes pa// sku gsung thugs la sogs pa yis// gzugs brnyan lta bur 'jig rten du// mnga' bdag byed ni rtag tu
21a7: dgag khyod na sems can srog ma lags/ / gang zag kun gzhi khyod ma lags// dus dang rang bzhin las mabyung / ci ltar ma legs tsam lags/ khyod ni rten nas byung btsam// snum lta bur dngos po spangs// chos rnams snu ma lta bur ni/
21a8: thugs su khyod chung rkang gnyis mchog/ khyod ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong // stong pa nyid kyang mchis ma lags// stong dang mi stong rnam par 'grol// nam mkha' 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

21b1: kan du bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ g.yog 'khor dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/
21b2: bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas khang pa brtsegs pa de dang bkod pa de dag dang sil snyan dang pheg rdob pa de dag las theg pa chen po'i thog ma'i spyod pa'i sgra gcig nas gcig tu'ur zhes
21b3: grag ste/ bzod nas zhi zhing mtshan nyid med// chos nyid gcig tu dag pa ste// khyed cag the tsom dogs spongs la// kye ma'o 'di la brtson par gyis// theg pa chen po'i gnas 'di ni// sngon gyi spyod pa bla na med// spyod pa'i rgyal
21b4: po sgying che ba/ / kun gyis shin du thob par gyis// sngon gyi spyod pa rgya mtsho rnams// yongs su dag pa'i rgyu yis ni// rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad ni// rtag tu 'di na mdzes la ltos// ston pa gang du'ang mi gnas la// gang du'ang spyad par
21b5: mi gnas kyang / / gang dag spyod pa rnams sbyangs pa// de dag kun la gnas par 'gyur// 'gro ba'i mnga' bdag mig dang ni// rna ba de bzhin sna dang ni// lce dang de bzhin lus dang yang // yid du snang ba ma lags so// dang po 'byung ba'i
21b6: spyod pa ni/ / gang gi tshen sbyangs gyur pa// de tshe bcom ldan rnam snang mdzad// rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu mthong // ring ba ma lags nye ma lags// nang dang phyi ni ma lags te// rtag tu nam mkha' 'drar gnas pa// rnal 'byor pa ni chen
21b7: po snang / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang pos/ tshigs su bcad pa dag brjod ma thag du stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs
21b8: te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na bdag bcom

22a1: ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po la 'di
22a2: skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
22a3: kun du bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po la 'jug pa theg pa chen po la 'jug pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni chos gang gi tshig bla dgas lags/ theg pa chen po
22a4: la 'jug pa de'i spyod pa ni ci lta bu zhig lags spyod pa de rtogs par khong du chud pa ni su zhig lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la legs so zhes bya ba byin
22a5: te sems can chen po legs so legs so/ / sems can chen po khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri ba ni yang legs so// de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas theg pa chen po la 'jug pa dang /
22a6: theg pa chen po la 'jug pa'i gnas bshad par bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la theg pa chen po zhes bya ba 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so// de'i 'jug pa ni byang chub bo// rigs kyi bu gnas shes bya ba 'da'
22a7: gzhi'o/ / de yang snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba'i spyod pa ste sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung nas yul dang dus kyi dbang gis de'i rnam pa ston pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang theg pa chen po ni rnam pa gnyis te/
22a8: 'dus byas kyis rab tu phye ba dang 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'o// de la 'dus byas kyis rab tu phye ba ni spyod pa'i ngo bo'o// 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'i theg pa chen po nyid ni theg pa chen po'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'dus

22b1: byas ni rkyen gyis bskyed pa ste rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid do/ / rigs kyi bu 'dus ma byas na mi skye ba'i chos nyid dang stong pa nyid rang gi ngo bo'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang spyod pa'i ngo bo'i theg pa chen po gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid
22b2: m ngon du byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul dang dus kyi dbang gis sems can 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung ste bya ba dang las kyis kun du bslang ba'i tshul gyis 'dogs
22b3: pa ste rigs kyi bu 'di ni spyod pa'i ngo bo'i theg pa chen po'o/ / rigs kyi bu de la 'dus ma byas kyi theg pa chen po nyid gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ ci ltar gnas pa'i chos nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so// rigs kyi bu ci ltar gnas pa'i chos
22b4: nyid ces bya ba 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so/ / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas pa'o// 'dus ma byas pa gang yin pa de ni mtha' gnyis la mi ltos pa ste de la
22b5: gdags pa'i ngo bo med cing mi gdags pa'i ngo bo yang med do/ / gang la gdags pa'i ngo bo med cing mi gdags pa'i ngo bo yang med pa de la spyod pa med do// gang la spyod pa med pa de brjod par bya ba ma yin no// gang brjod par bya ba ma
22b6: yin pa de dngos po thams cad dang bral ba'o/ / gang dngos po thams cad dang bral ba ni mi 'khrugs pa'o gang mi 'khrugs pa de chos so// tshes gang yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'o// gang
22b7: de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de bden pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu bden pa gang yin pa de yod pa'o// yod pa gang yin pa de brdzun ma yin pa'o// gang brdzun ma yin pa de yang dag pa'o// yang dag pa gang
22b8: yin pa de chos nyid do/ / chos nyid gang yin pa de mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// gang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de ye shes so// ye shes gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa'o// rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid

23a1: gang yin pa de btags pa'o/ / btags pa gang yin pa de rtog pa'o// rtog pa gang yin pa de kun rdzob ces bstan te/ kun rdzob yod pas spyod pa btags so btags pa yod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
23a2: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ba ston to/ / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bdud bzhi pham par byed pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po la thug pa'i bar dang
23a3: gnas pa dang / 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dang skye ba dang rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'byor pa dang rgud pa 'jig rten du kun tu ston to// rigs kyi bu de la stsogs pa dus dang yul gyi dbang nye bar bzung nas spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor bcas te/ thabs
23a4: sna tshogs kyi tshul rnams kyis sems can rnams la chos ston to/ / chos bstan pa de ni yang dag pa'i phul yin te theg pa gcig tu yang dag par 'du ba yul gcig yang dag par thob par byed pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na de bzhin
23a5: gshegs pa ni rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir ro/ / rigs kyi bu chos nyid gang yin pa de la ni gdags pa'am rnam par rig pa med cing mi dmigs te/ ye shes rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro// de la ni spyod pa yang med mi
23a6: spyod pa yang med pa bslab pa yang med bslab pa ma yin pa yang med do/ / 'dul ba yang med 'dul ba ma yin pa yang med do// de la ni lus sam ngag gam yid kyi 'jug pa 'am/ ldog pa mi dmigs so// de la ni de bzhin gshegs
23a7: p a zhes bya ba 'am sangs rgyas shes bya ba 'am byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'am nyan thos zhes bya ba 'am rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'am chos shes bya ba 'am dge 'dun zhes bya ba 'am lha zhes bya ba 'am klu zhes bya ba 'am
23a8: gnod sbyin zhes bya ba 'am dri za dang / lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto'i'aphye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i bar ram/ yod ces bya ba 'am/ med ces bya ba 'am/ bsod nams zhes bya ba'am bsod/

23b1: nams ma yin zhes bya ba 'am/ 'khor ba zhes bya ba'am/ mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 'ching ba zhes bya ba'am/ thar pa zhes bya ba med do// rigs kyi bu de la ni dus shes bya ba 'am chod ces bya ba'am skad cig
23b2: ces bya ba'am yud tsam zhes bya ba'am thang gcig ces bya ba med do/ / de la ni zla ba zhes bya ba 'am skar ma zhes bya ba 'am/ nyi ma zhes bya ba'am/ me zhes bya ba'am/ rlung zhes bya ba 'am chu zhes bya ba 'am/ sa zhes bya ba'am mtsha mo
23b3: zhes bya ba'am/ nyin po zhes bya ba'am/ dus tshigs zhes bya ba 'am lo khrud 'khor zhes bya ba'am/ zla ba zhes bya ba'am/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na rtog pas btags pa'i sgo 'jig rten gyi thathad kyi sung 'i snyeng pa dang / 'jig rten las 'as
23b4: pa'i btags pa'i sgo ci snyed pa de dag thams cad ni de la mi 'byung zhing med de/ de mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos nyid de gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir te de la gnyis su mi 'byung ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na
23b5: nam mkha' gnyis pa ma skyes pa'i phyir nam mkha'i khams ni gnyis su med pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu de bzhin du chos nyid kyang gnyis su med pa'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar na gang chos nyid 'di lta bu la spyod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa
